price: 16. Op de Dag zullen Wij jullie met de grootste greep grijpen. Waarlijk, Wij zullen jullie precies vergoeden.
arabic: يَوۡمَ نَبۡطِشُ ٱلۡبَطۡشَةَ ٱلۡكُبۡرَىٰٓ إِنَّا مُنتَقِمُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: yawma nabṭishu al-baṭshata al-kub'rā innā muntaqimūna
